data.name: Wrestling Superstar "Vampiro" - Playable Character
data.detailed_description:
Lucha Libre icon, Guardian Angel, a man of many talents, sinks his teeth into a new role as he becomes part of the plastic-melting team of "The Mean Greens - Plastic Warfare".

Vampiro is best known for time spent in World Championship Wrestling (WCW) in the late 90's, till close (2001), with his greatest success coming in Consejo Mundial de Lucha Libre (CMLL) from '91-'98, then on commentary, and occasional competitor with Lucha Underground 2014-2018. He still occasionally competes to this day, capturing gold around many promotions.
data.about_the_game:
Lucha Libre icon, Guardian Angel, a man of many talents, sinks his teeth into a new role as he becomes part of the plastic-melting team of "The Mean Greens - Plastic Warfare".

Vampiro is best known for time spent in World Championship Wrestling (WCW) in the late 90's, till close (2001), with his greatest success coming in Consejo Mundial de Lucha Libre (CMLL) from '91-'98, then on commentary, and occasional competitor with Lucha Underground 2014-2018. He still occasionally competes to this day, capturing gold around many promotions.
data.short_description: Lucha Libre icon, Guardian Angel, a man of many talents, sinks his teeth into a new role as he becomes part of the plastic-melting team of "The Mean Greens - Plastic Warfare".
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
